resources.string: You are just 3 steps away from Protection against Theft.

"After completing SMS setup you will be able to remotely: 

● Lock the phone 
● Delete Logs
● Delete Contacts
● Wipe Internal Memory
● Factory Reset Phone"

"PIN code will be required to remotely:

● Lock the phone 
● Delete Logs
● Delete Contacts
● Wipe Internal Memory
● Factory Reset Phone
● Unhide App Icon
● Unlock App"
PIN will also be required to unlock this App

"After completing Web setup you will be able to: 

 ● Recover phone data 
 ● Find location of your phone 
 ● Retrieve picture of thief"
Administrative permissions are required for the app to function properly

"Please make sure Security Level is 100%. :

● Lock the phone 
● Delete Logs
● Delete Contacts
● Wipe Internal Memory
● Factory Reset Phone
● Unhide App Icon
● Unlock App"
Please Restart Mobile Anti Theft App
